incidents.name: Twilio Error Log Data Issue

incident_updates.body: Twilio Error log Data was degraded between 8:57 PT to 22:19 PST on 04/18/2023. During this period of time customers may have encountered errors when accessing error log data. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Lag delivering Events in Event Streams

incident_updates.body: Event streams system was impacted and customers may have observed lag receiving Events between 4:13am CET and 5:02AM CET. Our engineering team has detected and resolved the issue.

incidents.name: Our Engineers are Investigating an Issue with Billing Recharges and Account Suspensions

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the billing issue triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.

Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with billing recharges and account suspensions. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with billing recharges and account suspensions. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with billing recharges and account suspensions. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: MMS Failing With MMS Converter Enabled

incident_updates.body: We have observed a full recovery with MMS sent with MMS Converter enabled. This incident is resolved.
We are observing recovery with MMS sent with MMS Converter enabled. Our engineers will continue to monitor the issue to ensure a full recovery, and we will provide another update in 30 minutes.

We are experiencing an issue with MMS failing to send with media attached, or failing with the 21602 error code if no message body is provided, when MMS Converter is enabled. Our engineers are investigating the issue, and we will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
We've become aware of a potential issue with MMS Converter. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing issues with the Super SIM Usage Record API. This incident is resolved.
We are observing recovery with the Super SIM Usage Record API. Our engineers are continuing to monitor the issue, and we will provide another update in 30 minutes.

We are experiencing elevated HTTP 500 error rates from Super SIM Usage Record API. Our engineering team is actively investigating the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or sooner once more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue where almost 100% of the Super SIM Usage Record APIs are failing since 10 minutes. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: 500 Error From Authy API

incident_updates.body: The Authy API was degraded for 2 minutes between 10:53 AM to 10:55 AM Pacific Time on 04/13/2024. During this period of time, the API dropped many requests. Some customers were unable to start or check verifications. Also, some end-users may have seen errors in the Authy apps. The issue has now been resolved.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Authy API. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Proxy Service Returning 5xx From a Single Host Brought INLB Due to Autoscaling

incident_updates.body: Twilio Proxy service was degraded for 46 minutes between 7:15 AM and 8:01 AM Pacific Time on April 12th 2024. During this period of time Proxy based customers would have not received messages inflight, and Proxy session create/updates would have been impacted, resulting in users not being able to connect over a message. The issue has now been resolved.

Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Our Engineers Are Investigating an Issue With Proxy Service Returning 5xx From a Single Host Brought INLB Due to Autoscaling. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.
